description: Leading a team of 10+ engineers in developing next-gen EMR systems. Architected a microservices-based backend that improved system uptime by 99.9%. Spearheaded the migration of legacy monolithic apps to cloud-native architectures.
Developed and maintained HIPAA-compliant patient portals. Integrated third-party payment gateways and insurance verification APIs, reducing administrative overhead by 40%.
Built responsive web applications for pharmacy management using React and Node.js. Collaborated with UX designers to improve patient booking workflows.
